I love to support Nonprofits. *I help them improve there products and services to make the world a bit better.

Ahoy! I am Niklas, a problem solver with passion for good user experience and technology.

In the day I’m a concept developer and researcher for Apps and Websites with a focus of thoughtful user experience currently employed by Mandarin Medien.  At night, I work on secret projects, and support NGOs with time and knowledge. I live in Schwerin, in the Northern Germany. It’s pretty nice here, I think you’d like it.

Here are some selected companies I had the pleasure working with: Vodafone, Cinestar, Pohl Boskamp, 7S Group, Abbvie, Atlantic Hotels, Carlsberg, Conergy and ColorLine.

I write about opinions on technology focused products and it’s effect on our world.

  • The God Login
  • UX Day 2014 – A recap

Drop me a line: I ramble on Twitter, show my work on dribbble, share my code on Github, network on LinkedIn, and stream the soundtrack of my life on Spotify.
